casebody.data:
MOLOKAI SERVICES INCORPORATED, a Hawai'i corporation, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Pearl A. HODGINS, Friel Enterprises, Inc., a Hawai'i corporation, Pauline L. Castanera, Cornwell S. Friel, Geraldine M. Shah, Doe Defendants 1-10, Defendants-Appellees. NO. CAAP-15-0000464 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. February 28, 2018

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Affirmed in part. Vacated in part. Remanded.
